Angmar.bonus: Friendly Angmar Orc models within 3" of a friendly Spirit Hero model gain the Terror special rule.

Barad-Dûr.bonus: Sauron's Warband size is increased to 24. Additionally, a force that consists solely of models from the Barad-dûr army list will never be considered broken if Sauron has 3 or more Wounds remaining. Should Sauron have 2 or fewer wounds remaining, the army will break as normal. Should Sauron be slain, the army will immediately count as bring Broken.

Mordor.bonus: Whilst you have more models in play than your opponent, friendly Mordor Warrior models gain +1 courage and may re-roll natural 1's To Wound when making strikes.
